milestones.title: Center Construction Completed
milestones.description: Renovation and setup of classrooms and facilities finalized.

milestones.title: First Batch of Students Enrolled
milestones.description: Fifty students began attending after-school sessions.

milestones.title: Laptops Distributed
milestones.description: 20 refurbished laptops were distributed to students.

milestones.title: Coding Workshops Launched
milestones.description: Weekend coding classes launched in the community center.

milestones.title: Meal Plan Finalized
milestones.description: Balanced meal menu approved by nutritionist.

milestones.title: Lab Equipment Purchased
milestones.description: Modern lab tools and safety equipment acquired.

milestones.title: Tutors Hired
milestones.description: Three native English-speaking tutors joined the program.

milestones.title: Interactive Materials Distributed
milestones.description: Language learning kits distributed to 60 students.

milestones.title: Computers Delivered
milestones.description: 25 refurbished computers installed at the learning center.

milestones.title: IT Training Began
milestones.description: Weekly IT classes started with focus on basic skills.

milestones.title: Studio Space Renovated
milestones.description: Renovation completed with improved lighting and acoustics.

milestones.title: First Art Class Conducted
milestones.description: Students participated in their first drawing and music sessions.

milestones.title: Tutors Onboarded
milestones.description: Experienced math tutors joined the program.

milestones.title: First Practice Session Held
milestones.description: Students began practicing for upcoming math competitions.

milestones.title: Sports Equipment Installed
milestones.description: New gear and safety equipment set up in the center.

milestones.title: Coaching Sessions Started
milestones.description: Certified coaches began weekly training programs.

milestones.title: Library Van Purchased
milestones.description: Mobile library vehicle acquired and equipped with books.

milestones.title: First Community Visit
milestones.description: Mobile library visited 2 rural schools.

milestones.title: Sunnydale Elementary Computer Lab Upgrade
milestones.description: 75% of computers have been ordered! Installation begins next month.

milestones.title: Sustainability and environmental awareness program
milestones.description: First round of environmental workshops completed successfully.
